data.text: @ladywithapen Thank you! I hope you're back to full health soon too!
@saintlande That’s good. I was sick for ten days and I still have a scary-sounding cough. I hope you continue to feel fine.
@ladywithapen Fortunately I think it's about over. Had a slight fever, coughing and tired for maybe 10 hours.
@saintlande I couldn’t read when I had Covid, my brain just couldn’t handle it. I hope it’s not that bad for you!
@saintlande We went to an 80s party. I assumed he lived in the 80s.

@Pastakeith I can't find a gif, just picture it: Forrest Gump scene where he tells a president (can't remember which one) that he was shot 'directly in the buttock', and the president says "Why, I'd like to see that".

@Skjaldmaer1 @Beloved_Persis Thanks! I don't have any prior knowledge of either, so clean slate. The Bridges was a gift, the Watson was 4 bucks. I really like the Valley of Vision, so I said why not try a Puritan feller.
